report.title: Explore record images using standard filters for CEDaR
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in iRecord, with standardised filtering parameters. The current difference between this and the filterable_explore_list in occurrence_images is the ability to filter by taxon_list_id.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrence_media om on om.occurrence_id=o.id and om.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms mtype on mtype.id=om.media_type_id JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: Taxon list to limit report to
param.join: JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.taxon_list_id=#taxon_list_id# AND ttl.deleted=false

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: formatted
column.sql:
CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then '' || o.preferred_taxon || '' ELSE '' || o.preferred_taxon || '' || COALESCE('
' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '-> ' END || CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE o.recorders END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#user_id#' AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: belongs_to_site
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end
